title: Black sun
creator_contributor_role: Victorian College of the Arts, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Funeral rites and ceremonies
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Death
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drugs
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Women - Drug use
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Funeral rites and ceremonies
description: The story begins and ends with a funeral. A group of female friends unite for a night of drugs, music and memories under the full moon. One of the girls has been away to the city, and discovers that things don't stay the same, that friendships change, and can be challenged and proven very quickly. Cast includes Raelee Hill and Brigid Kelly.
